content.detailedDescription: Same as above
content.summary: I looked out my back door as i do multiple x a day when i smoke,  entity was in the horizon cast infront of a light from house, it new i was looking, when i became paniced it darted into the shawdows.

content.detailedDescription:
As we were driving from richmond kentucky, my friend and i saw cigar object. i have seen many lights in the sky. this object was sigheted at the same time by my now decesised friend, and i. it ws cigar shaped, and seemed to be the length of a football field. it was spotteded at the limestone quarry in clover bottom. neither of us questioned it or said a word. it appered to emit a greenish glow, with a redishesh tail. very phourfhus coler. it's rear and it's. it seemeed to be the length of  a football field. as it went over the horizen, we drove fast to to top of the ridge and stopped the car. when we got out , it was no where to be seen. suddemly a formation of f-15 fightrers went over us at appx:500 ft . that coninued to scoure the area. we drove into mckee and went out back, 10 miles away. the ufo had just passed over the army rocket depot at richmond ky were there is a large strorage of ww2 chemical munitions, which is still there today. it was so long ago that i am not crear of exact year. in the early 80,s. this thing was real. not the quick lights in the sky, as most people see. hope this helps.!!!!!!!! you may call me at [phone number removed/cms/tg].

[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: It 2was cigar shaped, lenghth of football field. glower green, with red glowing at back. cigar shaped

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my friends back yard, i saw what i thought was a very bright slow and low plane moving slowly, it then changes directions at an acute angle multiple times about 5 or 6 direction and speed changes traveling about 1/4 mile each time before accelerating at speeds i thought we're not possible, from almost close to me, all the way across the horizon instantly and it was gone, the whole thing lasted about 1.5-2 minutes. my friends i was with we're not there/not paying attention, and as far as i know i'm the only one who saw it. i don't know what it was, it seems impossible but it changed how i see our place in the universe.
content.summary: Glowing orb, first moving slowly, then multiple abrupt directions changes at incredible speed, then accelerated to unbelievable speed across horizon

content.detailedDescription: During the summer of 2009 i was out watching over a latteral irrigation unit, that liked to quit on its own, to keep it running. a couple miles north of clarkton missouri. it was between midnight and 1am as i was setting in my pickup listening to the radio, all of a sudden a big orange red ball of bright light appeared from no where. the ball of light was what seemed yo be about 100 feet above the east treeline of the field i was watering. it sat very still for about 4 to 5 minutes.  while watching trying to figure out what i was seeing i called my mother who lives about 30 minutes away in kewanee missouri and had her look out her back door above her east tree line to see if she could see it. i was thinking it might have been some crazy eclipse or some really really bright planet or anything. she said there was nothing in the sky where she was.  after hanging up the phone it started to descend. i watched it as it descend very slowly for about 30 to 45 seconds until it went behind the tree line. at this point i was very curious but also scared. i started my truck and drove as fast as i could to get around the tree line to see what landed. after the 30 seconds or so it took to get around the tree line there was nothing there. like it just vanished.
content.summary: Red orange round object appeared hovering above a tree line then descended behind it and vanished. no sound. size of top of round water tower.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
I want to know what mufon thinks/knows about this..
i was investigating some sort of ufo sightings that we can see on google street view, and (by my own) i've discovered it is just lens effects, on the sighting at jacksonville, tx - above "capital one" building, on intersection of 69 with 79, historical image of july's 2008 - and on the sighting at acoma pueblo, nm - near "sky city casino hotel", above pueblo rd, north acomita village, on the left side, historical image of march's 2008 - and finally on the sighting that someone "expert" has said that he found an alien head sticking out of the supposed "ship": mt-200 trout creek, montana - 47d 51' 17.60" n, 115d 36' 42.60" w. at this last one, i was just playing around a little bit - because i've never used google street view before, and i was amazed with both the gsv photo-realistic quality and technology and with the beauty of this land's landscape - when i found something that, for the experience i have of investigating plenty of ufo's phenomena for many years, if it's not what it looks like for me - a "lockheed f-117 nighthawk" (or something similar) - then i want to know your opinion: can you identify this object?
thanks a lot in advance for your attention!
content.summary: Real ufo seen on a fake ufo sighting on google street view

content.detailedDescription: [item moved/cms/nd]
content.summary: #58361   was not a fluke.Or a lie.

content.detailedDescription: My fiance & i were parked on side road off hwy to bx whitestone bridge. suddenly, at treetop level, a cookie-box shaped circular ufo glided over car & cruised out over hwy very slowly, as if it was on sight-seeing tour. it kept on casually, with a line of planes overhead lining up on glide path to the airport. i expected to see them all make a sudden u-turn & get the heck out of there, but they didn't. it was as if they couldn't see this thing. but how could they not?? if i stood on the roof of my car & was stupid enough, i could have thrown a rock & hit it!! i then started looking around the sky, & what do i see almost directly overhead? another ufo! this one was way up there, much larger, & shaped differently. also it was going in a different direction. it was long & naerrow, with long rows of white lights outlining the entire length. this thing was huge. it had a small shorter light on each side near the fron at an angle, leading me to call it a giant sled; because that's what it resembled. these 2 weren't together at all, leading me to exclaim "what the bleep! is there a bleeping convention going on??" the 1st ufo, by the way had 2 or 3 alternating rows of red & white lights running vertially across the back. they pulsated with a strange rythym sort of like the lights on an ambulance.
content.summary: Saw 2 at same time near glide path to laguardia airport

content.detailedDescription: I first spotted three orange orbs in a straight line horizontally. i watched them as they hovered but eventually they appeared to be descending but it was so slow you couldn't tell if they were until i used the top of a truck as a reference point and noticed after several minutes they had descended ever so slightly. i went inside for a few minutes and when i came back outside they were still there in a line but it was obvious they had descended. i watched them for another minute until they all three faded to black. after about 10 minutes the orbs reappeared but they were no longer in a line one was at a higher elevation and off to the left of the lower one. they were both in a different location in the sky than originally spotted. they both appeared to descend very slowly below the horizon maintaining an exact distance from one another
content.summary: Orange orbs

content.detailedDescription: Me and my co driver were west bound on interstate 8 mile marker 145 .We witnessed 2 fire like balls that were hovering but moving up and down. after witnessing them for nearly 5 minutes they vanished an dc directly after that a blue light came on and then another and when the 3rd one came on the 1st one went out and it consisted that pattern for about ten seconds as it stretched across the sky.  we both lost cell reception. i was covered in chills. appx 20 minutes later my co driver pointed towards the south and there were 3 lights that were lined up in a 45degree angle that split apart one by one starting with the highest one. appx 35 min later we seen the trailing lights again.
content.summary: Seen 2 flame like lights. trailing/blinking and splitting apart

content.detailedDescription:
I began recording what i thought was a star, but after watching the video footage afterwards it actually shifted it position in the sky, meaning it wasn't a star.  this happened 2 times within 1 minute on the video tape.  there was no identifying characteristics about it.  it twinkled like a star but didn't behave like a star, having moved.  the object, as i will call it, was northeasterly in position to my house where i saw it.  tonight i tried to record it again, my dvd recorder actually recorded 45 minutes but then crashed in finalizing it.  two other discs i tried failed to record the object at all. one disc failed after 2 minutes of recording, so i took it out and put another fresh disc in.  after 45 minutes, i wanted to watch what i had recorded.  it never could finalize it.

the only footage i have is about 6 minutes from december 4, 2014.  it is the most compelling footage i have ever seen of a ufo.  i want you to know this happened, in the event that the government might be testing something that affected my equipment.
content.summary: Assumed star in sky shifted its position in the sky 2 different times

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was standing in the parking lot of my apartment complex looking up towards the sky.
2. telepathic contact
3. a definite formation of spacecraft
4. their shape was very similar to "jupiter 2" from tv series "lost in space" but smaller and had no visible windows. each craft was 3 meters in diameter and all craft were identical. there were 4 craft flying a perfect in-line linear formation like pearls on a string. all craft were identical in appearance and had a small tower-like structure on top of its center dome. i received subtle telepathic contact to expect an encounter. i went outside into the parking lot and stood for about 8 minutes before my attention was drawn to a line of 4 craft circling my apartment building. they flew in a circular formation around the building, decloaking as they flew. they stopped just in front of the rental office and hovered silently for about 60 seconds. the craft never fully densified. they travel interdimensionally and raise and lower their frequency to cloak and decloak.
5. i was surprised when i actually saw the craft. who expects to receive a telepathic message to expect contact, walking outside and then seeing them? i was in mild shock for several hours after the incident.
6. they simply "faded out" or cloaked.
content.summary: Craft decloaked while making a slowly descending circular path around me at 25 to 30 ft

content.detailedDescription: Had a 1968 bike and my dad was helping me get it tuned for spring riding.We lived next to a steep rock mountain with a lake bed that filled each spring melt. it first sounded as if a jet was coming over the mountain and then over our home,very load! as we both looked up it stopped and at the same time the sound stopped. it just sat there and watched us,we were both on our knees next to the motorcycle. we talked later and think it was just about 3 seconds,then it started to pulsate a sound as if it were winding up. it was more and more sound as it went away very slowly about 100ft and crossed the main hwy about 4ft off the ground. as it went on it turned as an airplane would. banking to let us see the shape even better.It went behind some cottonwood trees and we watched it go lower towards the spring high water and out of sight. my dad said we could never talk about this to anyone,not even my two brothers and mom in the house,he was upset and i had never seen him like this. when we walked in my little brother ask if i saw the jet? mom said it must of been just over the house and she didn't like that they could fly that low. she said that the big window shook so bad she yelled for my little brother to get away from it. dad said yep it was a jet and flew very low. that was the end of that.      one year later again when the spring melt and high water,i came home from school to see my dad and little brother sitting at the table looking at a drawing. dad said come over here,as i looked down there was the craft that i and dad had seen one year earlier.His story was that being home alons he heard the chickens making noise and when he looked out the back window they were running around crazy with a shadow going in circles. he grabbed his 22 rifle to kill the hawk or what he thought was one.When he got out side the chickens had ran off and he didn't see any thing. he walked up on a hill below the rock mountain about 75 ft from the house. as he stood there looking he said the hair on his head and neck felt as if it was eletrifide,he looked up and it was just above him,so close he could of touched it with the rifle. he said he couldn't move from fear and it started to move away toward the same flight path it had taken before,banked behind the same tree and went down towards the pools of water. we never saw it again,but i would like to tell more about what it looked like
content.summary: Father and i near front porch,sounds like a jet is coming over house,was as if at drag race,it shock our chest.Stopped next to us and stayed,then flew very slow off very low to ground

content.detailedDescription: Not sure of the exact date, but it was getting cold in the weather. and it was in 2012 furring the big shooting stars show close to winter. those clues could narrow the date down to one who knows how to search for such. i was watching for the shooting stars when above me i saw a strange dark basketball sized cloud hovering and flying in an arc like path. i called my wife and two kids out to see it. over the course of 3-4 hours we saw multiple ufos larger in size some were triangle shaped a few looked like a giant eagle. they glided overhead at different speeds. then when we thought it was all over, just over a nearby tree top a giant light blue almost transparent stingray shape was just hovering there with pulsing white blue lights. it had to be over 500 ft long. then it was just gone. after that searchlights like a light house in the distance was circling. off in the western horizon. when the ufos would glide by we lost sight of them easily because they blended in with the night sky so well. my step daughter was scared at the time but the rest of us were exited at what we were seeing. this all happened over a year ago so i'm sure i've forgotten some of it. then a little over a month ago me and my son were just looking up and we happened to see two really fast dark clouds fly by. they were actually pyramidish shape and also made no noise. then they to blended with the night sky. they moved north to south.
content.summary: Boomerang cloud like ufos and a stingray shaped blue ufo all very silent.

content.detailedDescription: At about ten o'clock am pst i was in the back yard smoking, when i heard a plane. nothing strange about that, but as i was looking for the plain, i noticed a bright white "object" in the sky. i went and grabbed a pair of binoculars and i could see it was clearly a circular something way up in the sky. i grabbed my telescope and zoomed in with a k25mm lense and an 8 inch telescope. it was totally stationary for about 7 hours. i have a video on youtube under the username grimvolf. i also have several photos saved, many were lost to unknown reasons. my wife got home from work at just before four o'clock and saw the object as soon as she got out of the car. it remained in the exact same position until cloud cover came along at about five o'clock pm. from that point i don't know if it was still there, but it was there for me for seven hours that i am aware of! it may have been there only a matter of minutes before i noticed it, or days, i have no clue. but it was amazing nonetheless!
content.summary: White disk with edge lights for 7 hrs stationary entire time

content.detailedDescription: No noise or motion when our 5th grade class first saw round silver object with dome just outside 2nd story window. clear day. no clouds. object noisless. finish dull silver. no windows or visible openings. none of us had heard of term "ufo". noone was frightened but teacher was alarmed and reported to principal. object hovered noiseless in same position for app. 10 min, then accelerated at extreme speed over mountain behind our school. years later our teach=r recalled this incident. myself and 2 classmates still remember and discuss exactly same details
content.summary: Our 5th class, teacher &principal viewed round metallic object hovering outside class window. no noise or wind. hovered app 10 min then  accelerated so fast above mountainp

content.detailedDescription: Sitting by a fire watching a movie on my phone. i thought my wife had her light on from her cell phone and it was coming from behind me my whole yard was lit up when i turned like led lights were on. i seen it in the sky a bright white ball.  moving fast like it was coming down i lost it in the trees but waited for a crash sound never heard anything.  i didn't know what it was. i wanted to tell my wife she thought i was crazy. i was very exited for some reason.
content.summary: Fast and very bright larg e and quiet

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
As usual during the night i have troubles getting to sleep, so i usually, get up, have a coffee and smoke a cigarette, go online until i get tired and then try again later. i went outside to smoke the cigarette, and wandered around the apartments looking upwards, strolling to relax, as i always do when outside at night.

it was approximately 3am, a silent night, with a mild wind which is calm for the area i was living in 300m to the beach in scarborough, perth, western australia. with the cloud ceiling at 1300ft, and a slight dribble of rain, but nothing too drenching that i could not stand outside in it.

the apartment complex i lived in with 20 other people is on a high terrain  in scarborough, where you can get a few of the surrounding suburb and of parts of the beach, a beautiful place to live.


so, as usual looking upward and strolling around, suddenly notice, coming from the west direction over the beach, was this bright orange object, which shot up into the sky, as if someone had fired a emergency flare into the air (which sometimes people do for fun at perth beaches) but immediately noticed how it was not exactly shooting upward in ascension like a flare fired from the ground, but was in fact, coming at such an incredible speed from over the dark horizon of the indian ocean towards the beach coastline of perth, that it 'seemed' to look like it moved upwards, but was in fact, moving towards the city. the lights are as brighter than a street light, round, spherical, but oddly could be stared at in its brightness.

it stopped literally on the coastline, where the water meets the sand, hovering around 100-150m above.

in that exact moment that i realized that this object had in fact entered the air space at an incredible speed, another object did the exact same movement, shooting into scene, and then suddenly slowed, and stopped close to the other light, in a vertical two star formation.

this is when i knew, it was definitely not people messing around with flares, and that this was something beyond our technology. this is also the moment when something strange besides the visual witnessing of these two star like lights happened (much larger than stars, about the size of a penny at arms length away), something that put perspective into astronomical enthusiasm. this feeling it/they gave me.

when the second light arrived, and formed the vertical 'two star formation" it was as if they knew i was looking at them, as if i caught them by surprise being 3am on a dribbly overcast night in sleepy perth, western australia.

the feeling that i received from it/them was out of this world, (i will try to give my best explanation in an analogy)

the feeling was like suddenly coming face to face with an old, ancient, godzilla sized creature, that was gargantuan in size, and gave off a feeling that it was from a place much older than ours.

like something of a pre-historic dinosaur, but, without any actual visualization of a dinosaur creature, it is hard to explain.

but also, i received a visualization in my mind at the exact same time of this 'huge dinosaur like feeling', of a dark brown, dusty nebula region, with no visible stars in it. just a dark brown, dusty region of space. this lasted for just a few seconds, it gave me a scare, my face blushed, but i did not feel threatened by the feeling it gave me. 

the next awesome part of the experience was about to happen.

after this 'visual feeling' that i experienced went away after a few seconds, suddenly, the first light that arrived into the sky moments before, started to move slowly left, towards the south west, kind of along the coastline, but heading more back out towards the ocean, keeping a stable altitude and slow speed below the cloud line.

but, just as it was around 400m from where it first was, (this next part looked absolutely amazing), suddenly 4 more lights, one by one, shoot into scene as if arriving from ultra high speed over the ocean (exactly like the first two did) and went into a four star formation just as the second light started to leave, following the first light to the south west.

i could not believe my eyes in this moment, it looked like something from a science fiction movie, of space ships coming out from hyper space speed into a 'war zone' to fight the alien enemy. absolutely spectacular.

for some reason, it just entered my mind, having the cigarette lighter in my hand, to light it, hold it up, as if i was at my favorite band's concert and they are playing the hit softy song that everyone loved. i suppose i was trying to say 'hello' in a way. i was scared, but not in fear of my life, just confused in awe at what these light could be.


anyway, the four lights stayed there for as long as the first two did, for around 10-20 seconds, before one by one, it/they left towards the south west, then 10 seconds later, another to the south south-west, then another followed that one, and the last one went more westward back out to where they came from.

as all lights were leaving the area back out into the darkness above the ocean, at the same height and speed, still in view, i quickly ran in to get my house mate, who going to the toilet, and said to him calmly "do you want to see some ufo's?", my friend, half winked and still half asleep coming out of the bathroom in his underwear, said "huh?" and followed me outside to the area where i witness the lights.

as soon as he saw the 6 lights moving of in those direction, still under the cloud line, his face lit up like a little boy on christmas, and knew straight away that they were not from this earth.

he was kind of pacing around in his underwear outside in the apartment complex 3am in the morning, with me telling him what he just missed with them being in formation, we both reassured each other that this type of sighting was a long time coming for us, being enthusiast of space, astronomy and science fiction space travel.

the lights began to fade into dull lights as the grew further and further away, as if they 'turned off' and you could see the actual faint objects they were, from the light pollution of perth city hitting their surface, approximately 5-10 kilometers away.

once they disappeared into the distance, i ran straight inside, made coffee and went straight online to the bureau of meteorology australian government website, to check satellite and weather data (that is how i found out the ceiling height was approximately 1300ft).

also, i sat up for the rest of the morning until sunrise (too excited to attempt to back to sleep) and was googling to see if anyone else in perth had seen any lights in the sky that morning.


this is not the first time i have seen lights in perth, in fact, many of us here in perth have seen them many times in single or two formations.

on another occasion recently in 2014 i saw them again, but nothing like this experience in 2010, so i thought i would share this experience as it has far more profound elements to it, than the simple quick sighting of the same 6 lights on the other occasion.

i have talked recently to people online in perth about unexplained events in the skies above our city, and some others have seen those rascally six in the skies before as well. 

but this, was something out of this world with 6 of them zooming into the perth skies like something out of a movie.


(a tip for those whom wish to witness something in the night sky)

become keen in astronomy, observe the night sky in all of its natural awe.
by doing this, you will spend countless hours looking up at the beauty of the heavens, and this is how, you will see something strange every now and then that you cannot explain. hundreds of hours of viewing and i guarantee you, that you will eventually see ufo's. 
keep a camera with you at all times.
content.summary: 6 bright orange lights, suddenly shot up from the west, hovered in formation, then left area

content.detailedDescription: I was going up to the airport to deliver drop off some packages for the aircraft. i was waiting at the gate for someone to notice me. after about 15 minutes of waiting, i glanced up and saw a very faint set of lights in the shape of a triangle. i could immediately tell that they belonged to an aircraft of some sort. i used to be a pilot. the first thing that struck me was that the object had no beacon lights what so ever. my first thought was it was a stealth fighter of some kind, however upon observing the aircraft, i noticed that the aircraft was too narrow to resemble any kind of fighter jet that i've seen. it didn't change directions, speed up or slow down, or pulsate at all. it just silently flew into the horizon. it was dark, so i couldn't make out a shape against the night sky, but judging by the lights, i would guess it was a triangle. i'm not entirely sure how far it was off the ground, but i can say that if it were a plane, it was flying notably low, especially for being in class b airspace (again, with no beacons). it was also flying perpendicular to the runway in front of me. i took a video of it, however the video is really just a black screen with me going crazy.
content.summary: Looked up and saw a narrow formation of lights in the shape of a triangle

content.detailedDescription:
this is the witness' version of the sighting: 

sighting- on november 23, 2014 at around 8:25pm i was in my back yard barbecueing when all of a sudden a large craft with pulsating and strobbing red and orange lights went over my house. the craft was disc shaped and the lights were on the perimeter. 2 minutes later another craft went over. same direction and speed with absolutely no noise. another 2 minutes passed and a 3rd craft went over. i was getting a little nervous now. again a 4th craft came over. same direction and speed with the pulsating lights. i ran in and got my phone to video the objects and i did! i was able to video the objects from 8:34pm until 8:46pm. after the 5th object i am speaking on the video until the dissapearance of the 9th object..

*************************************************************************


[submitted by fi mary margaret zimmer from information given to me by witness on december 7th and 8th, 2014. 
his videos and stills which were taken from the videos are attached below.

his camera is a lg4 smart phone, luminous.
content.summary: 8 or 9 glowing objects passed over near house

content.detailedDescription:
I was 12, playing in the terrace with my brother 10, we saw two light objets coming down from the sky at very high speed. they were flying over the uranium mine, at a distance of 8 kilometers from us. they came from the west, portugal direction, stop in the sky for a while and descend to the land very quickly; the stay there for a while, like two minutes; then they lift up verticaly to the same position in sky they descend, like two kmts high. and then disapear fast in the sky in an angle of 60º
all the seeing took like 10 minutes.
content.summary: Two light spheres coming down to the uranium mine

content.detailedDescription: My nephew santi and i were taking a walk after studying trig all evening, during the walk santi told me to look to the east where there were two objects flying stationary, first impression was it must be an aircraft until i noticed the objects did not have the lights associated with any commercial aircraft. as i was looking in amazement santi was excited and pointed my head directly above us where there was and object at low altitude making absolutely no noise flying directly over our heads. i was also surprised that they were the strangest lights i have observed as i am a pilot. while i was looking at the craft flying over head santi saw a cylinder black object also over head flying in a southwestern direction which he said was black. i felt a little shocked whereas santi was just excited, i have never seen an object that i could not identify. santi wanted to run and get the video camera where i felt a little lethargic. the two objects hovering to the east were still there a few moments ago whereas the other object that i viewed was flying to the south/southwest, santi claims the cylinder shaped object was flying to the south/southwest as well. i would never envision being so anxious and lethargic after witnessing what i did.
content.summary: 2 ufo's to the east, stationary, suddenly one flew directly over our heads, there was a cylinder shaped object 5 minutes later that flew directly over our heads.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my living room. my front door faces north and there is a vertical clear glass window built next to front door. i went to look through the glass about 3pm or so to see if my neighbor across the street was home because i needed to retrieve something i had loaned. 
at that time there was some sort of communications tower (pre cell-which no longer remains as far as i know, trees have grown etc)visible behind the homes across the street. (in cul de sac)
i noticed something in the sky just above, behind and right to neighbors house that looked a good sized ball bearing, floating just off the top left of the tower. (which was located a mile or more behind the houses)i cannot be sure it was near the tower, but that was my point of reference.
i opened the door and walked out to get a better look. as i walked down my driveway, heading for the cul de sac across the street, the object instantly became 3 like objects. fist they were parallel to each other on the vertical, then as fast as i could watch, all 3 objects became horizontal. the next movement saw the left and right orbs take off in opposite directions at what i can only describe as hyper speed. within one or two seconds, they reappeared on the horizontal, and then moved inward in a blink becoming one orb again. the object then moved off to my right at 45 degrees at so, faster that i could track.

i recall thinking, oh man, why can't my neighbor drive up right now?
i was unsure at what i was seeing. it was fascinating. i was not concerned or otherwise disturbed during the event during or after. i spent years at sea with the us navy, working on the flight deck of aircraft carriers and i am very familiar with many types of aircraft and their behavior as well as their capabilities.
i knew that i was not seeing a typical aircraft. of that i remain sure to this day.
Too complex to put in text...
content.summary: Life altering

content.detailedDescription: I was in the sky, mountains, big of a red orange color, my first impression was, he thought it was the moon with a very special color, but move very slowly and see their movement, discard it the moon , it was hiding atraz mountains until i lost sight of it was very nice but did not take importance, it was clear that it was not normal, thanks
content.summary: Bright round object

content.detailedDescription: It was a clear night, and i always notice the stars and at first i thought it was a star. then i noticed it was moving. first observed in the sw, moving slow or about the speed of a plane landing. aboout 500 feet? the night was quiet and the object made no sound at all...It was heading in the direction of the airport but at that angle it would have been approaching the 4000 ft mark on an 8500 ft. runway. also the runway points nnw to sse  (338 deg.) so it would have crossed over the runway on an x diagonal, and planes do not fly over the runway that low. what got my attention was the absence of red and green navigation lights and a strobe light. i lost sight of it over a tree line.
content.summary: Single non flashing light moving sw to ne in a straight path

content.detailedDescription: I think it was 2 days after 9-11 world trade center terrorist attack got up early 5:30 or 6:00 and took the dog to orchard beach..... the parking lot was empty it was very quiet i hear no airplane in the sky.... orchard beach is  in the flight path  for laguardia airport ....As i looked toward the beach at the tree line i seen a very big black object that thought was a plane crashing ....So i ran with the dog  toward the beach.... when i got to the boardwalk (they call it that... even though  its not made of wood) i saw a black triangle craft that looked like a stealth fighter hovering at the edge of the beach no water splash no sand blowing everywhere  just a hum and a buzzing ...It was so quiet that the dog was not scared and my dog was scared of any loud noise ...As i walk along the boardwalk it follow me and the dog .... as it did .....It was moving closer to the boardwalk so close i could see  u.S.Symbols on the craft also i could see  the pilot clearly he had his helmet and visor  on in  the cockpit and the cockpit was lit up he gave me a thumb up sign i give him one back ...And from a almost standing still position he shot like a bullet without a sound  in a second he was gone  dog never got spooked  when it left i said to myself ...Boy now that is stealth .....I remember that it made me feel so safe... that we have that we have kind of technology i told this to my friends they know that i am not one to lie i have sent  this letter at least 3 times to mufon  every time i saw the show on the history channel its about time you believe me that we have this technology i kept telling you that those ufo's you have seen are us... i have just give just some pictures of the plane i saw at the beach as an example...  i hope you believe me... i been saying this since 2001... thank you
content.summary: Walk along orchard beach with dog saw craft  hover  i thought it was crashing on beach

content.detailedDescription: I was in my apartment around 8 pm on friday, december the 5th 2014. i heard sirens outside and then seen lights outside my window from some fire engines. after about 20 minutes i decide to take a look. i walk out of my apartment and down the street a bit to take a better look. now to be clear, at the time i took the photo's i was focused on the fire and not what was above, so i did not see the ufo with my eyes. but i did take two photo's, both of which have the ufo in them, with the ufo in different places. to me, i cannot logically explain what is in the picture, and that's why i'm posting it here.
content.summary: Ufo over house fire

content.detailedDescription: While i was in the army stationed in korea, i was in a field training exercise. i was doing my night patrol, i noticed with my night vision glasses an object above the hills moving back and forth, for about 35 minutes. then soon after,3 helicopters flew over me and toward the object. as soon as they came close to it, it darted straight up in the sky. i thought i was seein a training, but as soon as the choppers left, it came back down and started moving ghe same way again. my rounds was over but i woke up the person next for his turn. i showed him what i saw and he witnessed it too. for 4 hours we watched this object move above the hill. the helicopters came 3 times and every time it shot straight in the air. about 6 am,before sunrise, it moved colse to us and shot straight in the air. it looked like a orange red light but could not see any more of what it could be. my and my friend were the only ones to see it. we told our superiors but they laughed it off. i know i saw something and im sure the koreans saw it too. just thought id share it with someone. thanks for letting me share.
content.summary: Sighting in korea

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving down the road and we heard the radio turned to static. we looked out in front of us and there were three really bright lights that flew in front of us really fast and looked like it hit the ground. but there was no crash to be sighted. it seemed very large but we were the only witnesses. after the event (which lasted maybe 10 seconds) we both started getting kinda dizzy and sick. 
it shocked us both at what we saw. we drew what we saw and we both drew the same looking object. e.T. or not it was very disturbing.
content.summary: As driving we saw three lights travel at a very high speed then it just disappear.

content.detailedDescription:
I'm not 100% sure of the year anymore (i know it was easter, somewhere between 1968-1970), when i was ~ 10 years old, and was the first one out of my brother's house on bergen street in camden, nj to wait for my parents to come out and go home. i turned and saw the object silently gliding at about treetop height, moving from north to south. i stood there, dumbfounded, as i had never even thought about ufo's before, but realized what it was right away. it was wider than the city street, silver, with orange, segmented windows that had a steady glow to them. it slowly moved along the street, and passed behind a large tree at the end of the block, which i could see the object through the branches as i watched it disappear behind the last house on the block. i was so stunned, that i couldn't even run down the street to see where it went. i do remember that i had a hard time sleeping for the next few nights, as i tried to understand what i had seen.

i so wish that cell phone camera's were around, because i would've had one the best pictures ever. to this day, this is the thing that has me convinced that we are not alone in this universe.
content.summary: Disc at treetop height, moving silenty, < 1/2 block away.
